reviews.review:
Pros: The ending. That's it. Simply buy the game for the ending.



Now real review:
    Quite a fun puzzle game that may seem to become impossible but not so if you think simply in some cases. Undoubtly a game worth getting but would recommend waiting until it is on sale. The game is far too short to be worth $10 (mind I got it and its successor for $5 in a bundle during the Winter Sale of 2015). I see no cons in this game. Just watch out though, the robots try to kill you politely.

Ну вот игра и пройдена гладос убита ,но нет вас кто-то утащил <3
игра на 10 тортиков из 10

Yeah, it's a'ight.

...

But in all seriousness, Portal is a first-person puzzle game accessible to almost anybody with a functioning brain. I may even say it will never age - after all, the game is 8 years old, and it's still graphically competent by today's standards since it never really strives to be anything more than what it is, and that's actually pretty admirable. It's not, by any means, superficial is what I'm saying; what's there needs to be there, and what IS there satiates your needs for pitch-black comedy, solid gameplay and all that. It's worth almost any price you pay for it, despite its story length.

Enjoy it fam.
Un muy buen juego de puzzles y física, aunque tambien requiere cierta habilidad con los controles y algo de reflejos. Muy divertido. No apto para gente que se maree con facilidad.

被同学安利的，然而他晕3D。。。挺有意思的游戏，需要一定的空间想象能力和快速学习能力。游戏中需要学会或者是自己领悟一些游戏中的技巧，并且适时利用出来。某一关一定过不起不要着急，注意对场景的构造特征进行观察。
       另外说一下，一开始我是不知道还有大逃亡的剧情的。天真的我以为这就是个简单的闯关游戏。然而最后一关过完了着实把我吓了一跳。凭借一个直觉，然后就开始往外逃。刚开始逃得时候也是心里充满了激动，23333，现在想想也是蠢萌。。。。。。不多说，很好的游戏，也很便宜，大家一定要体验一下。（不过3D眩晕的同学一定不要一次性玩久了。。。）
这个游戏整体不错 最后通关的歌曲挺不错的 后面几关有点难 但是不看攻略我也过来了

Portal is whats missing in your life
Classic, must play!  If you don't have it, get it now.  It should be pretty cheap at this point so you have no excuse!

I'm ashamed in myself for not having played this game sooner, and you should be to. Portal is an innovative masterpiece. It blends in first person shooter and puzzle mechanic incredibly well. 

[h1] Pros [/h1] 
-Graphics look amazing mainly because the setting doesn't require much detail.

-Gameplay with the portal gun is incredibly fun, and the physics are really accurate from what I can tell. The puzzles while not incredibly difficult, do require you to think before you act. One of the few games that really requires you to use your brain.

-The atmosphere my god it really gets to you. The location you're in the entire game is a secluded lab, all with a plain color scheme. It really helps give you that claustrophobic feeling of being trapped. Glados, the robotic voice that accompanies you on your journey and guides you while serving as a sort of comedy relief, also gives you a sense of dread. Mainly because you don't know what her intentions really are. Especially near the end of the game, you start to feel even more trapped and helpless, and I found myself actually nervous on what would happen. 

-The story is kept very vague to you throughout most of the game. You don't know who you are, how you got to where you started, or what is at the end of all the tests. You just keep trudging forward because you want answers. It does a very good job of making you feel clueless, so nice job Valve.

[h1] Cons [/h1] 
Really the only downside is that the game is fairly short, and you could finish the storyline in 2-3 sittings (or one if you're truly dedicated). However there are bonus maps to play on, and speedruns are always fun. Not to mention there's a commentary playthrough which I highly recommend trying out, and it has the team talk to you about what went on when designing the game. 

I bought this game as a five dollar bundle during a Steam Sale that came with Portal 2, which I'm very excited to get to. So I have no regrets buying it. So if you don't want to pay 10 dollars for this, at the very least purchase it when it's on sale. This game needs to be in your library. Do it for the cake. 9/10

What can I say?... It's a Valve game. It's classic. It's fun. It doesn't lower your IQ. It's at times challenging, it can take me a couple minutes to figure out a test chamber challenge and then it could take me a hour to figure another one. 
I give this game a 10/10. Why shouldn't it get that much? No bugs or glitches, the game play isnt dry, the puzzles keep you on the edge of your seat and it's most importantly, fun. 
Do I recommend it?... no... Just kidding... I better recommend it

In portal si vede un gioco che apre la pista al suo seguito. Con portal valve ha visto che l'idea funzionava ed ha perfezionato tutto nel 2 che, comunque, in caso si debba scegliere questo o quello consiglio di prendere.
Spogliando Portal della sua fama che tutti danno a priori (comunque guadagnata), una persona che lo acquista da solo, senza il seguito, si ritroverà davanti ad una perla molto, molto piccola: i più lenti impiegheranno 3 ore a concludere la storia prncipale. Sembra quasi una versione di prova, e considerando che inizialmente è nato come terzo gioco (dunque con un ruolo di parziale riempimento) del bundle "The Orange Box" di valve, si spiega questa longevità ESTREMAMENTE limitata.
Portal è un piccolo capolavoro con una grafica piacevole ed un gameplay unico nel suo genere. Un must per chi possiede il secondo capitolo che resta comunque di gran lunga superiore.

La recensione non tiene conto delle possibili mod/custom map, ma si basa sulla storia e sul gioco "vanilla".
L'histoire principale est un peu courte, mais les "défis avancés" allongent la durée de vie. Le deuxième opus est fantastique et bien plus long, mieux vaut acheter le pack des 2
Solid game.
Diese Game ist ein Must-Have besonders wenn es gerade im Sale ist. Die Story kann man in ungefähr 3 Stunden durchspielen und mit den ganzen Achievements kommt man auf die 5 Stunden Spielzeit.

Vale que te lo pasas en dos o tres horas, quizá en algo más si es la primera vez que lo juegas o se te atrangantan más de la cuenta algunos niveles. Pero son horas redondas. De verdad. Por lo estrictamente jugable, que es lo más importante: una excelente propuesta de puzzles de acción en primera persona basados en portales de entrada y salida. Pero también por el magnífico diseño artístico, por la brillantísima apuesta narrativa, cargada de sentido del humor, y, sobre todo, por la sensación de estar disfrutando de una de esas pequeñas grandes obras, tan inspiradas y redondas, que importa poco lo poco que duren. En fin: ¡ve a por la tarta! Y si te sabe a poco siempre puedes echar mano de su más que digna secuela, que además es mucho más larga.

Estoy acostumbrado a que la mayoria de los FPS sean dirigidos a una audiencia mas aficionada. Por ello este juego resalta en terminos de accesibilidad sin sacrificar el ingenio de su diseño. Es un juego corto y aun asi vuelvo de vez en cuando simplemente para volver a experimentarlo. La mecanica es inherentemente divertida y los varios niveles aprovechan su potencial, en especial los niveles que utilizan la gravedad y la velocidad entre portales. La atmósfera otorga un aire de misterio sin ser necesariamente tan opresor, como un horror sci-fi ligero o implicito.

Este juego fue uno de mis primeros FPS, asi que diria que es el mas accesible que he encontrado por ahora. Aun asi, creo que esto es un juego esencial en esta plataforma que toda persona que tenga el interes común de los videojuegos deberia por lo menos dedicar un par de horas.
Noice m8
